create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_WEB_ONBOARDING_INTERACTIONS ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @SPONSORID uniqueidentifier, --@SPONSORSHIPCONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ISPROSPECT bit = 0, @FILTERDATE date = null, @CHILDREN xml = null, @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYIDCHILD uniqueidentifier = null, @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID uniqueidentifier = null, @PFMID uniqueidentifier = null ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
begin try declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate() declare @CONSTITUENCYCODEID uniqueidentifier; declare @DATEFROM datetime = getdate(); declare @DATETO datetime; declare @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier; declare @sponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null;
-- cursor variables: declare @CHILDID uniqueidentifier; declare @CHILDNAME nvarchar(max); declare @LOOKUPID nvarchar(7); declare @STARTDATE date; declare @WEBSPONSORSHIPID uniqueidentifier; declare @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST;
-- sponsorship extension variables: declare @statusText nvarchar(20) = null;
set @CONSTITUENTID = @SPONSORID -- this is the sponsor passed in from the form
-- *** NOT SURE NEED THIS? *** declare @reservationStatusCode_Sponsored tinyint = 2 --*** CMayeda - Used to set the status of the reservation key if it exists in USR_CHILDRESERVATION declare @reservationStatusCode_Open tinyint = 1 --*** CMayeda - Used to find reservations in USR_CHILDRESERVATION that are open ------------------------------------------------
-- Memphis: new for 2016 onboarding, set the PartnerID field in Interaction Extension if this is a Partner Co-Branding sponsorship -- this value is set below if there's a PartnerID set in the Add Prospect Sponsorship form: declare @doSetPartnerIDField bit = 0;
-- do the Partnership for Mercy setup if the user picked one: if @PFMID is not null begin -- call the sproc to manage the partnership stuff: exec dbo.USR_USP_HANDLE_SPONSORSHIP_ADD_PARTNERSHIP @PFMID = @PFMID, @CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID = @CHANGEAGENTID
-- check for the Co-Branding Fulfillment attribute of 'Yes - Partner': declare @coBrandYesFulfillmentCodeID uniqueidentifier = null; select @coBrandYesFulfillmentCodeID = ID from dbo.COBRANDINGFULFILLMENTCODE where lower([description]) = lower('Yes - Partner');
if @coBrandYesFulfillmentCodeID is null RAISERROR ('Unable to find the [Yes - Partner] Co-Branding Fulfillment Code!', 16, 1);
-- This is the Attribute table for ***DEV ONLY***: ATTRIBUTE797dbb124a23488b96284dc66e203908 -- PROD tablename is: attributedcf97954c27e4c8e916be0deb920ed05 --select * --ID,COBRANDINGFULFILLMENTCODEID,COMMENT --from dbo.ATTRIBUTE797dbb124a23488b96284dc66e203908 --for Local CRM Instance testing, use this Table: ATTRIBUTE1EB07079E1ED42A9A56FEFF6F839CE28
--look for the value of 'Yes - Partner' for the given Constituent -- this is for DEV: --if exists (select 1 from dbo.ATTRIBUTE797dbb124a23488b96284dc66e203908 where ID = @PFMID and COBRANDINGFULFILLMENTCODEID = @coBrandYesFulfillmentCodeID)
-- this is for LOCAL: --if exists (select 1 from dbo.ATTRIBUTE1EB07079E1ED42A9A56FEFF6F839CE28 where ID = @PFMID and COBRANDINGFULFILLMENTCODEID = @coBrandYesFulfillmentCodeID)
-- *** UNCOMMENT BELOW FOR PROD DEPLOYMENT **** \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ -- this is for PROD: if exists (select 1 from dbo.attributedcf97954c27e4c8e916be0deb920ed05 where ID = @PFMID and COBRANDINGFULFILLMENTCODEID = @coBrandYesFulfillmentCodeID) begin set @doSetPartnerIDField = 1; end
end -- @PFMID is not null
-- 5/30/2017 MSellers added new UFN to use to get the appropriate values from the children XML collection: -- USR_UFN_WEB_SPONSORED_CHILDREN_FROMITEMLISTXML -- returns: -- ID, ChildId, LookupId, StartDate, SponsorshipId declare @TempTbl table ( [ID] uniqueidentifier, [CHILDNAME] nvarchar(max), [LOOKUPID] nvarchar(7), [STARTDATE] date, [WEBSPONSORSHIPID] uniqueidentifier )
insert into @TempTbl select [ID], [CHILDNAME], [LOOKUPID], [STARTDATE], [SPONSORSHIPID] from dbo.USR_UFN_WEB_SPONSORED_CHILDREN_FROMITEMLISTXML(@CHILDREN)
declare childCursor cursor fast_forward for select ID, CHILDNAME, LOOKUPID, STARTDATE, WEBSPONSORSHIPID from @TempTbl
open childCursor
fetch next from childCursor into @CHILDID, @CHILDNAME, @LOOKUPID, @STARTDATE, @WEBSPONSORSHIPID
while @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 begin --*** New reservation code to account for Closed web sponsorships: -- EndDate should match the child's sponsorship start date -- search on child id update cr --dbo.USR_CHILDRESERVATION set cr.STATUSCODE = @reservationStatusCode_Sponsored --cr.ENDDATE = getdate() from dbo.USR_CHILDRESERVATION cr join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESS srp on srp.ID = cr.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESSID and NAME like '%website%' where cr.ENDDATE = @STARTDATE and cr.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @CHILDID --*** END New reservation code
if @ISPROSPECT = 1 set @statusText = 'Sponsored' else set @statusText = 'Prospect Sponsored'
-- insert into the sponsorship extension table: -- this is for Sponsored: exec dbo.USR_USP_INSERTNEWSPONSORSHIP_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION @SPONSORSHIPID = @WEBSPONSORSHIPID, @initialStatusText = @statusText, --'Sponsored', @currentStatusText = @statusText, --'Sponsored', @CHANGEAGENTID = @CHANGEAGENTID, @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = @CHILDID
fetch next from childCursor into @CHILDID, @CHILDNAME, @LOOKUPID, @STARTDATE, @WEBSPONSORSHIPID end
close childCursor deallocate childCursor
-- populate the child list with the current childid value before calling the sproc to create interactions: insert @childIDList select ID from @TempTbl;
-- 5/31/17: MSellers the interaction sproc is different if this is a Sponsor vs Prospect Sponsor: -- ** 5/31/17: MSellers NEED to figure out how to create the interactions for the given Sponsor -- ??? Can I call the sproc below and make it work, or do I need a new one, or a new parameter?
-- I *THINK* I can just get the 1st web sponsorship ID value and pass it into the sprocs below, -- the only thing that parameter's used for is to determine the financial/corresponding/sole sponsor! -- since all the web sponsorshipId values are for the same sponsor, and they should be web sponsorships, -- and all web sponsorships are Sole Sponsors, then it should work? select top 1 @WEBSPONSORSHIPID = WEBSPONSORSHIPID from @TempTbl;
if @ISPROSPECT = 1 begin -- call sproc to create the requested interaction type exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_CREATENEWPROSPECTSPONSORSHIPINTERACTIONS @sponsorshipID = @WEBSPONSORSHIPID, @childIDList = @childIDList, @interactionTypeCodeID = @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID, @changeAgentID = @CHANGEAGENTID, @doSetPartnerIDField = @doSetPartnerIDField, @partnerID = @PFMID end else begin exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_CREATENEWSPONSORSHIPINTERACTIONS @sponsorshipID = @WEBSPONSORSHIPID, @childIDList = @childIDList, @interactionTypeCodeID = @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID, @changeAgentID = @CHANGEAGENTID, @doSetPartnerIDField = @doSetPartnerIDField, @partnerID = @PFMID end
-- add the 'Sponsor' constituency code if not already there: -- get the constituencycodeid of 'Sponsor' or 'Prospect Sponsor'
if @ISPROSPECT = 1 begin select @CONSTITUENCYCODEID = ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE where lower([DESCRIPTION]) = lower('Prospect Sponsor'); end else begin select @CONSTITUENCYCODEID = ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE where lower([DESCRIPTION]) = lower('Sponsor'); end
if @CONSTITUENCYCODEID is null RAISERROR ('Could not find the "Sponsor" or "Prospect Sponsor" constituency code!', 16, 1);
-- check now for the given constituency code for the given constituent /* * 9/25/12 Memphis call the new function and check the return codes * 0 means con doesn't have this code: * 1 means con has this code and it ends in the future: * 2 means con has this code and it ends today! */ declare @constituencyCheckCode tinyint = 0; select @constituencyCheckCode = dbo.USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_HAS_CONSTITUENCYCODE_CHECKENDDATE (@CONSTITUENTID, @CONSTITUENCYCODEID)
-- 0 means they don't have the code, so add it: if @constituencyCheckCode = 0 exec dbo.USR_USP_ADD_CONSTITUENT_CONSTITUENCYCODE --@ID OUTPUT null ,@CHANGEAGENTID ,@CONSTITUENTID ,@CONSTITUENCYCODEID ,@DATEFROM ,@DATETO
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
begin try --*** New reservation code to account for Closed web sponsorships: -- EndDate should match the child's sponsorship start date -- search on child id update cr --dbo.USR_CHILDRESERVATION set cr.STATUSCODE = @reservationStatusCode_Sponsored --cr.ENDDATE = getdate() from dbo.USR_CHILDRESERVATION cr join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESS srp on srp.ID = cr.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESSID and NAME like '%website%' where cr.ENDDATE = @startDate and cr.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @childId --*** END New reservation code end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
return 0
